overview: Perfectly mastering the theme of licentiousness, Fred Coppula – veteran director of French pornography – gives us with LES AMANTS DE MA FEMME a tasty scenario that questions the notion of fidelity and the institution of “traditional” marriage. Are thus present in the credits of the film Manuel Ferrara - the Ferrari of international X -, the incredible member of Yannick Shaft (ex Ian Scott), the very sexy (and companion of Tiffany Leiddi in life) Ricky Mancini but also the now starified Clea Gaultier, the divine Nephael, the volcanic Lola Bellucci, the lovely American Kenzie Ann and the revelation Chloe Duval...
title: My Wife's Lovers
